casebody.data:
TROPIC-AIRE, Incorporated, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. E. A. LABORATORIES, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 111. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 20, 1937. Henry R. Ashton, of New York City (Har'old Olsen, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Duell & Kane, of New York City (Hoi- ’ land S. Duell and David S. Kane, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHÁSE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree- affirmed.
